channel.title: Awesome idea, little help first though
channel.description: ok i have an excellent idea for a neopets SCAR script but i need a bit of help first. basically i want a small section of the game to be monitered and if something changes in that area it will click on it. I am not sure if this is even possible, but i think it's like pixel search or something.

item.title: Awesome idea, little help first though
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

yea its possible but you need to be a bit more specific

Read full topic
item.source: Awesome idea, little help first though
